00026 // lbann_callback_timer .hpp .cpp - Callback hooks to time training
00028 
00029 #ifndef LBANN_CALLBACKS_CALLBACK_TIMER_HPP_INCLUDED
00030 #define LBANN_CALLBACKS_CALLBACK_TIMER_HPP_INCLUDED
00031 
00032 #include <chrono>
00033 #include <vector>
00034 #include "lbann/callbacks/lbann_callback.hpp"
00035 
00036 namespace lbann {
00037 
00043 class lbann_callback_timer : public lbann_callback {
00044 public:
00045   lbann_callback_timer(lbann_summary* _summarizer = nullptr) :
00046     lbann_callback(1, _summarizer) {}
00048   void on_epoch_begin(model* m);
00050   void on_epoch_end(model* m);
00052   void on_batch_begin(model* m);
00054   void on_batch_end(model* m);
00055 private:
00057   double epoch_start;
00059   double batch_start;
00061   std::vector<double> batch_times;
00062 };
00063 
00064 }  // namespace lbann
